turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good day, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order pizzas from Bella Luna's pizzeria. Can you help me out, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get two large thin-crust pizzas? One pizza, can I get a macaroni and cheese pizza? And the second, can I get a cheeseburger pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i checked bella luna's menu and don't see either pizza type. bummer. did you want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have a chicken bacon ranch pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they sure do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a chicken bacon ranch pizza. And what about.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sorry. A meat lover's pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yup, they have that as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. That's all I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order for 2 large pizzas with thin crust, 1 chicken bacon ranch, and 1 meat lovers pizza comes out to $24.09.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order, it'll be prepped, baked, and ready to go in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: YOU'RE WELCOME, GOOD BYE.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
